value.title: Novelists sue Nvidia to stop spread of AI models trained on copyrighted books
value.excerpt: Book authors are suing Nvidia, alleging that the chip maker's AI platform NeMo—used to power customized chatbots—was trained on a controversial dataset that illegally copied and distributed their books without their consent.

value.title: Broadcom sees US$10 billion in AI chip sales in 2024, but shares dip
value.excerpt: Broadcom said on Thursday it expects US$10 billion in revenue from chips related to artificial intelligence this year, but its stock dipped after the tech company’s full-year forecast failed to impress investors.
